import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { NewAppContext } from "../../App"; import useAuth from "../../hooks/useAuth"; import "./DashboardHome.css"; const DashboardHome = () => { const { userInfo } = useAuth(); const { depositInfo, setDepositInfo } = useContext(NewAppContext); const [depositInfo2, setDepositInfo2] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { //https://dmf-server.vercel.app/ fetch(`https://dmf-server.vercel.app/deposit`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { // console.log("event data", data[0].email); const filteredData = data?.filter((d) => d?.email === userInfo?.email); setDepositInfo(filteredData); setDepositInfo2(filteredData); }); }, []); // calculate deposit amount const depositAmount = []; depositInfo2?.map((data) => depositAmount?.push(data?.depositAmount)); const totalDeposit = depositAmount.length > 0 && depositAmount?.reduce((prev, curr) => parseFloat(prev) + parseFloat(curr)); console.log("object", totalDeposit); return (
